name: Tangerine-Vanilla Floats
description: Here is a refreshing twist on a Creamsicle: a swirl of vanilla ice cream (either store-bought or homemade, your preference) doused in fresh tangerine juice and seltzer. Get an industrious child to help juice the tangerines. Their reward will be sprightly, sweet and satisfying.
keywords: dessert, gluten-free, nut-free, summer, tangerine juice, vanilla ice cream
recipeIngredient: 3 cups freshly squeezed tangerine juice (from about 12 tangerines) or orange juice (see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Divide ice cream among 6 medium-size glasses or cups. Add 1/2 cup tangerine juice to each cup and top off with seltzer. Serve with a straw.
